title: Control Environment
description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values
guidance: Establish and communicate code of conduct policies

title: Board Independence
description: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight of the development and performance of internal control
guidance: Maintain an independent audit committee with cybersecurity expertise

title: Communication and Information
description: The entity obtains or generates and uses relevant quality information
guidance: Implement processes for collecting and analyzing security-relevant information

title: Information Security Policies
guidance: This is a parent category for organizing related requirements

title: Management Direction
description: Provide management direction and support for information security in accordance with business requirements and relevant laws and regulations
guidance: Document policies and review annually with senior management

title: Review of Policies
description: Review information security policies at planned intervals
guidance: Conduct annual policy reviews with stakeholder input
